mainText:
The world has lost a creative genius, but has gained a brilliant angel. His
 family and friends are in my thoughts and prayers. Steve was a brilliant man and the world will never be the same without him. Thank you Steve Jobs for everything you have given us. I've only ever owned Macintosh products and will never go to anything else. You will forever be missed.
header: One more angel in the heavens.
author: Kelley
